Test_Scenario: Verify user can add item to cart
Test_Steps:
1. Navigate to a product page.
2. Click 'Add to Cart'.
3. Go to the shopping cart.
Pre_Requisite: User is logged in and has selected a product.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Item appears in the cart with correct quantity and price.
Expected_Result: Item should appear in the cart with correct quantity and price.

Test_Scenario: Search for products with special characters
Test_Steps:
1. Enter a search term with special characters (e.g., '&' or '#').
2. Submit the search.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Search results display all matching products without errors.
Expected_Result: Search results should display all matching products without errors.

Test_Scenario: Attempt to complete checkout process with valid payment details
Test_Steps:
1. Add items to cart.
2. Proceed to checkout.
3. Enter valid payment details.
Pre_Requisite: User has items in cart and valid payment method.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Payment succeeds without timeouts or retries.
Expected_Result: Payment should succeed without timeouts or retries.

Test_Scenario: Apply multiple discounts to a product and verify final price
Test_Steps:
1. Add a product to cart.
2. Apply multiple promo codes.
3. Verify final price.
Pre_Requisite: Promo codes are active and applicable.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Final price reflects combined discount calculations accurately.
Expected_Result: Final price should reflect combined discount calculations accurately.

Test_Scenario: Load product page and verify all images are displayed
Test_Steps:
1. Navigate to a product page.
2. Scroll through images.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: All product images load without errors.
Expected_Result: All product images should load without errors.

Test_Steps:
1. Enter valid credentials.
2. Submit login form.
Expected_Result: User should be redirected to homepage.

Test_Steps:
1. Add items to wishlist.
2. Log out and log back in.
3. Check wishlist.
Pre_Requisite: User has added items to wishlist.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Wishlist items remain intact after logout/login.
Expected_Result: Wishlist items should remain intact after logout/login.

Test_Steps:
1. Navigate to a category page.
2. Apply filters.
3. Check results.
Expected_Result: Filtered results should match applied filters.

Test_Scenario: Verify order confirmation email is sent
Test_Steps:
1. Place an order.
2. Check inbox for confirmation email.
Expected_Result: Order confirmation email should be received.

Test_Steps:
1. Open mobile app.
2. Scroll down on a product list.
Pre_Requisite: Mobile app is installed and functional.
Expected_Result: Products should load continuously without breaking.

Test_Steps:
1. Write a review.
2. Submit the review.
3. Reload the page.
Pre_Requisite: User is logged in and has purchased the product.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Review appears on the product page.
Expected_Result: Review should appear on the product page.

Test_Steps:
1. Proceed to checkout.
2. Start typing address.

Test_Scenario: Verify duplicate orders are not placed
Test_Steps:
1. Attempt to place the same order twice.
2. Check order history.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Only one order appears in order history.
Expected_Result: Only one order should appear in order history.

Test_Steps:
1. Add a product to cart.
2. Apply promo code.
3. Verify discounted price.
Pre_Requisite: Promo code is valid and applicable.
Expected_Result: Discounted price should match expected value.

Test_Steps:
1. Perform a search.
2. Navigate to next page.

1. Purchase a gift card.
2. Apply it to an order.
3. Check balance.
Pre_Requisite: Gift card is purchased and applied.
Item is marked out-of-stock in inventory.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Item does not appear in search results.
Expected_Result: Item should not appear in search results.
Return request should be submitted successfully.

Test_Steps:
1. Switch language on site.
2. Check translated text.
Expected_Result: Translated text should match expected content.
Recommended products should match user interests.

Test_Scenario: Verify saved payment methods can be deleted
Test_Steps:
1. Go to account settings.
2. Delete a saved payment method.
Pass_Fail_Criteria: Payment method is removed from account.
Expected_Result: Payment method should be removed from account.

Test_Scenario: Verify shipping cost is calculated correctly
Test_Steps:
1. Add items to cart.
2. Proceed to checkout.
3. Check shipping cost.
Expected_Result: Shipping cost should match expected value.

Test_Steps:
1. Select products to compare.
2. View comparison table.
Expected_Result: Comparison table should display accurate data.

Test_Scenario: Verify seller feedback can be submitted
Test_Steps:
1. Leave feedback for a seller.
2. Submit feedback.

Expected_Result: Order history should display all orders.
Page should load within acceptable time.

Verify tax information appears on invoice
Verify profile picture can be updated
Test_Steps:
1. Upload new profile picture.
2. Save changes.

1. Sort products by price/rating.
2. Check results.

Test_Scenario: Verify subscription renewal emails are sent
Test_Steps:
1. Wait for renewal date.
2. Check inbox.

Test_Scenario: Verify shipped orders can be tracked

Expected_Result: Links should direct to correct content.

Test_Scenario: Verify pending orders can be canceled
Test_Steps:
1. Cancel a pending order.
2. Check order status.

Test_Scenario: Verify product variants can be selected
Test_Steps:
1. Select a product variant.
2. Check selection.

Test_Steps:
1. Purchase a digital product.
2. Download file.

1. Upload bulk order file.
2. Check results.
1. Open product page on mobile app.

1. Apply tax exemption.
2. Check tax calculation.

1. Merge two accounts.
2. Check merged account.

1. Click share button.
2. Check shared content.

1. Navigate to category page.
2. Check breadcrumbs.

1. Add/remove items from cart.
2. Check total.

1. Add/remove items from wishlist.
2. Check count.

Expected_Result: Page should load within acceptable time.

Test_Scenario: Verify password reset email is sent
Expected_Result: Password reset email should be received.

Test_Scenario: Verify app does not crash on startup

Test_Steps:
1. Proceed to checkout.
2. Check shipping options.

1. Scroll down page.
2. Check search bar.

Expected_Result: No duplicate responses should be sent.

Expected_Result: Download should complete within acceptable time.
